backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing party, payment, staff account, and branding management with storage and authorization mixins and various filtering and comparison utilities.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping performance-related features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of major frontend files including hooks, components, utilities, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base stylesheet defining light/dark theme CSS variables and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app defining routes, authentication flow, profile setup, readiness gating, and due-today alert activation.
frontend/src/components/admin/StaffManag: Admin panel for listing, creating, editing, disabling, and resetting passwords for staff accounts with dialog-driven UI.
frontend/src/components/alerts/DueTodayD: Displays an alert dialog listing parties with payments due today and allows navigating to each party.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an access‑denied message with an optional reason when a user lacks permissions.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapEr: Presents an initialization failure message with a retry button.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Provides the main login screen using Internet Identity with a simple login button.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileBoot: Shows an error screen when loading a user profile fails, offering a retry action.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting the user to enter and save their name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/components/auth/ResetAdminP: Dialog for resetting the admin password with validation, mutation handling, and error feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/StaffLoginS: Staff login form supporting error messages, success state, and admin password reset flow.
frontend/src/components/branding/Brandin: Displays the shop’s branding header with logo and name fetched from backend branding data.
Settings card allowing users to update the shop name and upload a new logo with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/import/ExcelPart: Allows users to upload a CSV file, preview parsed party data, and import parties with generated IDs while handling errors and progress states.
Provides the main app layout with navigation, branding header, logout handling, and a footer.
frontend/src/components/parties/PartyFor: Dialog for adding or editing party records, including ID generation, validation, and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/payments/Payment: Dialog for recording a payment with amount, comment, and optional next payment date validation.
Displays a list of payment history records with icons indicating next payment dates and location data.
frontend/src/components/transfer/JsonTra: UI for exporting all app data to JSON and importing data with merge or overwrite modes.
frontend/src/components/visits/PartyVisi: Dialog form for recording a party visit, handling amount, dates, geolocation capture, and submitting via useRecordPartyVisit.
frontend/src/context/ActorSessionContext: Provides actor session state and loading/error info using useActorSafe.
frontend/src/context/AppReadinessContext: Determines overall app readiness based on II identity, actor availability, and staff authentication.
frontend/src/context/StaffAuthContext.ts: Context wrapper exposing staff auth state and login/logout from useStaffAuth.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAuth.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and saving the caller's user profile via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useBranding.t: Hooks for retrieving and updating shop branding data through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useParties.ts: CRUD and lookup hooks for party data, gated by app readiness and actor availability.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/usePayments.t: Hooks for fetching payment records and recording payments or visits, with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useStaffAdmin: Admin-focused hooks for listing, creating, updating, disabling staff accounts, and resetting admin password.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useStaffPermi: Fetches a staff account’s permissions, falling back to defaults if unauthorized.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useTodayDashb: Builds today's visit dashboard by fetching all parties and filtering visit records for the current day.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useTransfer.t: Provides export and import mutations for upgrade data and invalidates related queries on import.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorSafe.ts: Creates a backend actor with retry logic and exposes loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useDueTodayAlert.ts: Maintains a simplified placeholder alert for parties due today with dismiss functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook to manage identity loading, login, and state.
frontend/src/hooks/useStaffAuth.ts: Handles staff authentication using the actor, persists session state, and manages admin checks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/excel/parsePartiesFromE: Parses CSV files into party records, validates required fields, and collects errors.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Provides helpers for formatting and parsing money, phone numbers, and PAN values.
frontend/src/lib/phone.ts: Offers utilities to normalize phone numbers and generate tel: links.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Converts between Date and Time types and formats dates and datetimes.
frontend/src/lib/transfer/jsonTransfer.t: Handles JSON export/import of upgrade data and merges imported data with existing state.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays today's visits and payments with summary cards and a detailed visit list using data from useTodayDashboard.
frontend/src/pages/NewPartyVisitPage.tsx: Allows selecting and searching parties to create a new visit, showing a dialog to record the visit.
frontend/src/pages/PartiesPage.tsx: Lists all parties with search and navigation, and provides a dialog to add new parties.
frontend/src/pages/PartyDetailsPage.tsx: Shows full details for a party including payments and visits, with options to edit, delete, or add payments/visits.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Provides reporting for selected parties, showing summaries and full payment history using actor queries.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Renders settings tabs for branding, import, data transfer, and admin tools based on staff permissions.
frontend/src/pages/VisitDetailsPage.tsx: React page that loads a party and a specific visit record via queries and displays amount, dates, comments, and optional location with UI components.
frontend/src/utils/staffSession.ts: Utility for storing, retrieving, and clearing staff login session data and checking admin accounts.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: JSON snapshot describing the project’s state, features, issues, and architectural notes for the party ledger app.
